Event.name: Cycle count
Event.Description: Counts the number of clock cycles. Every clock cycle increments the counter

Event.name: L1 D-Cache read hit
Event.Description: Counts the number of data-cache read hits

Event.name: L1 D-Cache read miss
Event.Description: Counts the number of data-cache read misses (including non-cacheable and non-bufferable cache accesses)

Event.name: L1 D-Cache write hit
Event.Description: Counts the number of data-cache write hits

Event.name: L1 D-Cache write miss
Event.Description: Counts the number of data-cache write misses (including non-cacheable and non-bufferable misses)

Event.name: Instruction executed
Event.Description: Counts every time an instruction is retired

Event.name: MMU bus request
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles to complete a request via the MMU bus. This request can derive from multiple masters

Event.name: L1 I-Cache bus request
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the Instruction cache requests the bus until the data returns

Event.name: Write buffer write latency
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the write-back buffer requests the bus until the data is written to the bus

Event.name: Hold LDM/STM
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the pipeline is blocked because of multiple load/store operations

Event.name: Predicted branch count
Event.Description: Counts the number of times a branch is predicted successfully

Event.name: L2-Cache read count
Event.Description: The number of L2C cache-to-bus external read requests
